data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Comilla, Chittagong, Bangladesh into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Comilla, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,749 believers in Comilla that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who are far from you in Comilla. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,749 believers in Comilla to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 5,380,551 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Masalchi people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 5,387,300 people living in Comilla through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Comilla, Chittagong, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the county of Comilla, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 5,387,300.

We estimate Comilla has 6,749 people who might know Jesus, 16,162 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,364,389 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Comilla to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
